name: Egg Racer (LD49)
description:
Don’t drop the egg!

Controls: Gamepad supported for movement and jump.

W and A or Arrow Keys to Move left and Right

Spacebar to jump

Esc to Pause and go to menu

Made by:

Supreme Eggsecutor: SecretRobotron

Eggsogenos Force: Benjamin Blanco

Egg Ninja : exmxpx

Made in Unity, free, premade Assets used:

Red Dinosaur by Samuel Lee

Sunny Land by Ansimuz

Nature Pixel Art Base Assets FREE by Blackspire

Frying Pan: Generic Items by Kenney.nl

Home made stuff:

SFX, Sprites: Benjamin Blanco

Music: Made with soundtrap.com by exmxpx

Egg Magic: SecretRobotron
